name: SnatchWord
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snatch word
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The goal of Snatch Word is to snatch words for points and then hold on to them for as long as you can. The more words you own, the higher your score, and the higher your position in the weekly leaderboard. In Snatch Word, you play against players from around the world in real time and those players can be using a smart speaker or smart display from one of the top voice assistants. 

You have 3 main actions: FIND, SNATCH, and RENEW. Each day, you have unlimited FIND actions but only a limited number of SNATCH or RENEW actions. Any word that you can FIND, is fair game to own. 
Try:
• "Find apple" OR "Find the word: apple"
• "Snatch apple" OR "Snatch the word: apple"
• "Renew apple" OR "Renew the word: apple"

There are other commands that you should know.
Try:
• "Help."
• "Repeat."
• "Show leaderboard."
• "List my badges."
• "List my words."
• "List my expired words."
• "List my snatched words."
• "Family mode ON/OFF"
• "Set player flag to <country>" (shows on leaderboard)
• "Goodbye."

You get a total of 5 active reminders so you can remember to renew your words or snatch the words of other players. 
Try:
• "List reminders"
• "Add a reminder for the word: apple"
• "Delete reminder for the word: apple"

---
PERMISSIONS
• Reminders - set a reminder to snatch or renew a word
• Alexa Notifications - get game messages and announcements

---
FEEDBACK
We hope you find Snatch Word to be fun and engaging. If you have feedback or suggestions, please contact us via our Facebook page.

---
RESOURCES
• snatchword.com
• facebook.com/snatchword
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
